text: He muminagana! Tomara yakhana allahara pathe yatra karabe takhana yaca'i-bacha'i kare nebe [1] ebam ke'u tomaderake salama karale iha jibanera sampadera asaya take balo na, â€˜tumi mumina na'o [2]â€™, karana allahara kache anayasalabhya sampada pracura rayeche. Tomara to age erupa'i chile [3], tarapara allaha tomadera prati anugraha karechena; kaje'i tomara yaca'i-bacha'i kare nebe. Niscaya tomara ya kara allaha se bisaye sabisesa abahita
